doc.title: A Fireside Chat with Lionel Barrymore
doc.plot: A short made by MGM to promote its release of _Christmas Carol, A (1938)_ (qv) . Actor 'Lionel Barrymore' (qv) traditionally read the 'Charles Dickens' (qv) novel in a radio broadcast every Christmas; he didn't do it in 1938 so as not to conflict with the release of MGM's film. Instead, he made this short to discuss the novel--and the upcoming film--with the audience that would normally listen to his broadcast.
